modName: Pogo - Your Snowy Sabre Cat Companion
summary: A tough, trustworthy beast to have take your side in battle!
descriptionHtml:
________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
--Description--
Have you ever wanted a non-human follower? A strong one, whose teeth pierce the enemies throats, and claws drip with blood? Then you've come to the right place fellow player! Pogo, your personal Sabre Cat, will guard you until death. If you wish to find Pogo, he will be awaiting you in the Sleeping Giant Inn of Riverwood.

--Installation--
(NMM)
Download using Nexus Mod Manager, then activate the mod via NMM.
(Manual)
Download manually, and then drag the file into your Skyrim Data folder.
(C:Program Files (x86)SteamsteamappscommonSkyrimData)

--Uninstalling--
(NMM)
Uninstall by deactivating the file(s) in NMM.
(Manual)
Remove all file(s) in your Skyrim Data folder.

--Recommended Mods--
UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul
-OR-
AFT - Amazing Follower Tweaks

--Notes--
As this is my very first mod, I am very open to constructive criticism and ideas you have for the mod. If this goes well, I plan to add many more creature followers and compile them into one mod.

--Updates--
v1.02
Changed unarmed damage to scale with lower levels, and raise on higher levels.
Now regenerates HP during combat, resulting in a more tank like follower.
v1.01
Fixes Pogo's level so that he scales with the player, increased health pool.
v1.00
Pogo is released on Nexus Mods.
________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
author: KosmosX
